alert.note: Alert for Tate; Tunica (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 23 at 2:36AM CDT until March 23 at 11:50PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Mississippi... Coldwater River near Sarah For the Coldwater River...including Sarah, Marks...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Coldwater River near Sarah. * WHEN...Until late this evening. * IMPACTS...At 21.0 feet, extensive flooding is occurring near Marks. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:00 AM CDT Wednesday the stage was 20.2 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 2:00 AM CDT Wednesday was 20.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest near 21.0 feet this morning. It will then fall below flood stage late this afternoon. - Flood stage is 18.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/memphis. The next statement will be issued as conditions warrant.
